topics.body:
Here's a weird question: is it weird that I'm now watching hentai and porn like someone watching tv?


What I mean by this is that the city I'm in there's literally nothing to do here.  The malls suck hard cause they literally only have the bare basics of what you would call a mall so I don't go to them and the movie theater is clear across town and it's just not worth it.  The college I'm at there's fuck all to do; all we really have is a basketball court and a tennis court.  I've already watched all the movies from the library; they don't have any good books cause they're all mainly for school classes.  I can't get tv in my room cause it'd be fucking expensive to get it.  So my only real options of how to spend my free time is play video games/read fanfics or watch porn and I've already beaten almost all of my games(I only have 6 games left that I have yet to beat so I'm going to be completely out of unplayed games by the end of next week as well since I'm going to have a week of literally nothing to do).

While I don't have a lot of free time lately the fact that I don't have anything to do in my free time other than look at the clock waiting for class is annoying.
topics.author: 38b55cdf63616403d7560600

Moral: making video games is fucking stressful and requires a lot of work.

Second moral: C++ is a pain in the ass.
